item.title: “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hey everyone! Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well. In an official …

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone!

Two days ago we reported that the “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond” show was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic affecting the world and that a livestream show would be taking its place. However, today it was announced that said live broadcast has been cancelled as well.

In an official statement on the Hatsune Miku Official Blog, organizers said the following:

“Regarding the performance of “Ningyo Joruri x Hatsune Miku – BUNRAKU Beyond”, we have continued to make adjustments to distribute live audience performances via streaming but due to the expanding infectious state of the coronavirus disease we have decided, at the request of Tokyo’s Governor Koike, to cancel the scheduled live video distribution.

COVID-19 has made it impossible for us to provide live audiences and performers the required safety on a health standpoint.

We deeply apologize to many of you who were looking forward to our show.”

Refunds

Nico Nico Live Broadcasting
For users who have already purchased the livestream ticket for the show, your Nico Nico Points will be returned soon as possible. Once the Nic0 Nico Points have been returned, we will contact you with the email address you’ve registered at the time of your purchase.

We urge you to wait until you’re contacted.

TwitCasting
Refunds will be issued via bank transfer from S.A.P.

Click here for more details.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Twitter

The post “BUNRAKU Beyond” LIVE Broadcast Has Been Cancelled Too! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “39 Culture 2020 WORLD & FES” Has Been Officially Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The tour will be held once again in the venue from last year as it was decided by the organizers. Starting from the Shibuya Loft in Tokyo. then all the way to Nagoya, Umeda, Fukuoka, and Sapporo. Those who live in rural areas will be able to participate! It was decided that the themes this …

The post “39 Culture 2020 WORLD & FES” Has Been Officially Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The tour will be held once again in the venue from last year as it was decided by the organizers. Starting from the Shibuya Loft in Tokyo. then all the way to Nagoya, Umeda, Fukuoka, and Sapporo.

Those who live in rural areas will be able to participate! It was decided that the themes this year would be “WORLD” and “FES” . Four illustrators have joined together to create beautiful illustrations for this event.

“Akakura” and “maruco” were responsible for illustrating the head and body illustrations for the “WORLD ” theme. As for “FES” the people responsible were “TSCR” and “Matatabi”.

There will be goods and merchandise using these four illustrations during the event available for purchase, each item using the themes described beforehand like you have seen before!

The theme song of 39Culture 2020 was created by 40mP, and its title is “BEEP GIRL“!

Check it out below!

“39Culture 2020” Collaboration Store

Summary

  • Venue: Shibuya Loft, 6th floor (Art & Culture Floor)
  • Period: From March 6, 2020 to March 23, 2020. From 10: 00 PM  until 21: 00 PM. The last day of the event the store will close at 18:00 PM.
  • Admission: Free

Other Venues  

  • Nagoya Loft: April 3 to April 13. Store will close at 18:00 PM on the last day of the event.
  • Umeda Loft: April 24 to May 11. The store will close on the last sunday of the event at 18:00 PM.
  • Tenjin Loft: May 15 to May 31. The last day of the event the store will close at 18:00 PM.
  • Sapporo Loft: June 5 to June 15. The last sunday of the event the store will close at 18:00 PM.

Click here for more details.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official on Twitter

The post “39 Culture 2020 WORLD & FES” Has Been Officially Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta
item.dc:creator: khanadee
item.description:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace. I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful …

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
This past weekend, I was one of the many VOCALOID fans to attend Anime Weekend Atlanta. At long last, 1st Place debuts ARIA; a story of life, love and peace.

I won’t be sharing too much information on the contents for those that want to experience it themselves without prior knowledge. There was a wonderful story that continued from beginning to end, with lots of unexpected IA and ONE lore sprinkled in.

It’s very clear how much 1st Place cares for IA, ONE and their fans. The concert was fantastic from a visual, story and musical standpoints. Several new songs were created for the concert and I would highly recommend checking out the soundtrack when possible.

Another highlight was certainly the live dancers. There were some very complicated moves they pulled off that made the crowd go absolutely wild. The choreography was amazing and the dancers were spot on. The costumes were just as good; in particular, I loved the complexity of the first one.

What a beautiful concert! Thank you for coming to the U.S.! @IA_ONE_Official @1st_PLACE0302 pic.twitter.com/DYT4qOlBza

— haneoka (@Haneokaa) November 4, 2019

(Some people got to take pictures with IA, depending on what ticket they purchased. What a beautiful outfit!)

Outside the concert was a booth full of IA and ONE merchandise. I may or may not have spent at least $80 there, but it was totally worth it. At the booth was also an AR poster, where you could take a picture of IA and ONE!

Thank you, Anime Weekend Atlanta!!

IA
ONE/OИE
Staff#awacon #IA_ARIA pic.twitter.com/3Ppgtsrtzh

— IA&ONE公式 (@IA_ONE_Official) November 1, 2019

Please continue to support 1st Place and other companies, and request concerts like this or VOCAMERICA to come to a local convention near you! I look forward to seeing where ARIA and IA go next.

Sources

1st Place is on Twitter, as well as Facebook (and a global Facebook) and their own website.
Anime Weekend Atlanta has Twitter, Facebook and their own website.
Haneoka is on Twitter and DeviantArt.

The post ARIA Debuts at Anime Weekend Atlanta appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland!
item.dc:creator: Cinzya
item.description:
Those who follow VocalNexus, and Aki No Matsuri on Facebook or Discord should know this already: IA will finally make a stop in Switzerland! The Swiss convention Aki No Matsuri, which already hosted VOCAMERICA two years ago, welcomes IA (Aria on the Planets) in cooperation with VocalNexus this year on the weekend of August 31th …

The post “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Those who follow VocalNexus, and Aki No Matsuri on Facebook or Discord should know this already: IA will finally make a stop in Switzerland! The Swiss convention Aki No Matsuri, which already hosted VOCAMERICA two years ago, welcomes IA (Aria on the Planets) in cooperation with VocalNexus this year on the weekend of August 31th to September 1st.

 

IA (Aria on the Planets), der digitale Superstar aus Japan, begeistert auf der ganzen Welt Millionen von Fans mit ihren…

Posted by Aki no Matsuri on Sunday, August 11, 2019

 

With the permission of 1st Place, VocalNexus will bring “IA-PARTY A GOGO! 2017” to the screen in the cinema hall of the multi-purpose complex Teuchelweiher in Winterthur, Switzerland on both Saturday and Sunday. Details of the performance will be announced on-site by the Aki No Matsuri.

But there is more! Everyone will get the chance to receive a small gift by answering IA’s survey at the VocalNexus booth.

Unfortunately IA’s merchandise, which has been sold at other conventions in the past, will not be available this time.

Tickets

You can buy tickets for the convention at Ticketino you can check on their prices below.

Golden Weekend Con Package: 157.95 SFr (about 163 USD)
Weekend Con Package: 79.80 SFr (about 83 USD)
Weekend Ticket: 53.75 SFr (about 56 USD)
Saturday Ticket: 32.55 SFr  (about 34 USD)
Sunday Ticket: 32.55 SFr (about 34 USD)

Details can be found on the official page of Aki No Matsuri (German only) as well.

Accommodation plan (ticket not included)

Those who arrive from outside the country will even have the opportunity to book an overnight stay in addition to their ticket! You can find the price list below.

Sat/Sun single room: 43.00 SFr (about 45 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 2 persons (price per person): 43.00 SFr (about 45 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 4 persons (price per person): 32.55 SFr (about 34 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 8 persons (price per person): 27.15 SFr (about 28 USD)
Sat/Sun room for 12 persons (price per person): 27.15 SFr (about 28 USD)

Breakfast (price per person): 14.10 SFr (about 15 USD)

Opening hours

Saturday: 10AM ~ 6PM (CEST)
Sunday: 9AM ~ 5PM (CEST)

Follow VocalNexus and Aki No Matsuri on social media to stay up to date. We at VNN will also report to you as soon as there is something new!

Sources

Aki No Matsuri Official Website
Aki No Matsuri Official Facebook
VocalNexus Official Website
VocalNexus Official Facebook
VocalNexus Official Twitter
IA World Page

The post “IA PARTY A GOGO 2017” Fan Screening in Switzerland! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku x Yomiuri Land Collaboration!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Are you a fan of amusement parks perhaps? Because seems that our favorite twintail diva is gonna join forces with Yomiuri Land from almost a whole month, bringing many new attraction and games you will be able to participate as well when visiting their park! There are many parts of this collaboration so why don’t …

The post Hatsune Miku x Yomiuri Land Collaboration! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Are you a fan of amusement parks perhaps? Because seems that our favorite twintail diva is gonna join forces with Yomiuri Land from almost a whole month, bringing many new attraction and games you will be able to participate as well when visiting their park! There are many parts of this collaboration so why don’t we check on them together?

About Yomiuri Land

Yomiuri Land it known to be Tokyo’s largest amusement park, where you can enjoy 44 different type of attractions, and event attend special events throughout the year. Surely the perfect place where to have fun and make good memories! Starting from February 23rd until March 17th Hatsune Miku will be a special guest of the park and some attraction will even fit her own theme! If you are a Miku fan, you should absolutely visit it and join their activities!

Admission Offers and Fees

    • One Day Pass (Entrance + sea lion show + free pass for attractions)
      Adults (18 to 64): 5,400 JPY
      Mid-high: 4,300 JPY
      3-years-old to Elementary school: 3,800 JPY
      Senior (65 and above: 4,500 JPY
    • Entrance Fees (Entrance only)
      Adults (18 to 64): 1,800 JPY
      Mid-high: 1,500 JPY
      3-years-old to Elementary school: 1,00 JPY
      Senior (65 and above: 800 JPY
    • Hiyoko Pass (ntrance + sea lion show + free pass for up to 21 kids attractions)
      Adults (18 to 64): 3,800 JPY
      Mid-high: 3,300 JPY
      3-years-old to Elementary school:  3,000 JPY
      Senior (65 and above: 3,300 JPY

Yomiuri Land location

Miku Stamp Rally

Visitors will be able to join an Hatsune Miku-themed stamp rally! You will have to find 39 different stamps scattered around park, which will bring you to visit many important areas of the location. Collecting all of the 39 stamps you will get a can badge and a sticker as prizes, it surely sounds fun isn’t it? Are you bringing your children as well? Because there will also be a special Stamp Rally for them, with only six location to visit.

Admission:

  • Miku Rally: 1,000 JPY
  • Kid-oriented Rally: 500 JPY

Concert Screenings

On the Miku Day (39 Day, March 9th) they will also hold some concert screenings of past Miku events starting from 1 PM until 4 PM at the Nittele Lang Lang Hall! No real Miku fan would want to miss this opportunity!

Ticket prices:

  • Adults: 1,000 JPY
  • Children and elementary students: 500 JPY

Nittele Lang Lang Hall Location

Special Newspaper Edition

Are you planning to visit Yomiuri Land GJ shop as well? Hope so, because there will be a special edition of their newspaper in sale, featuring the event’s illustration, priced only 500 JPY! They have still to show us the illustration they will use, but we can’t wait to see them!

Yomiuri Land GJ Shop Location

Sea Lion Show

We always dreamed of attending a sea lion show when we were little, but who would have ever thought to see one themed after Hatsune Miku! That’s right, during the event the sea lions will perform with Miku songs in background, while their trainers will wear some special outfits as well! All of those exhibitions will be held during all of their performances starting from February 23rd. There will also be some shows on March 2nd and 17th as well! Those shows will be held at 3 PM JST, be sure to not miss them!

Special attractions

Of course no amusement park would be a real thing without some attractions, and Yomiuri Land is no exception! During the collaboration there will be many of them following Hatsune Miku as a theme! The Spin Runway, the Giant Sky River, the Bungee Jumping attractions and their Kadokeshi Torokko (their Trolley Cars will take you on a ride) will be all themed after our beloved tel virtual diva!

Admission fees:

  • Spin Runway: 900 JPY (One day pass)
  • Giant Sky River: 600 JPY (One day pass)
    You can also request for them to take two photos during your ride! It will cost 1,000 JPY and will give you access to the digital copies of them.
  • Bungee Jump: 900 JPY (Various paths are unavailable)
    You will also get a novelty gift!

  • Kadokenshi Torokko: 400 JPY (Various passes available)

Be aware that each of those attraction has age or physical restrictions, so check them out before attending them!

Workshops

Last but not least, there will also be a special workshop area where visitors will be able to craft their own T-shirts (costs 1,500 JPY) and Tote Bags (costs 600 JPY) themed after, of course, Miku! This area will be held at the Fashion Factory venue “Wakuwaku Fashion Lab” and will be open from 11 AM to 13:30 PM on weekdays and from 10 AM to 4 PM on Saturdays and Sundays.

They can only let in 60 people daily and there is no reservation service, so you need to be fast to get in.

Sources

We would personally love to visit the Yomiuri Land amusement park ourselves, and you? Enjoining such a marvelous environment themed right our favorite virtual diva would be absolutely fun! Feel free to send us photos and tell us about your experience there if you manage to visit the park!

And don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for more news and updates!

Press Release on Hatsune Miku’s Official Blog
Yomiuri Land Blog Post

The post Hatsune Miku x Yomiuri Land Collaboration! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA at MMC Berlin in Germany!
item.dc:creator: Cinzya
item.description:
After a successful screening at Japan EXPO in Paris, France, IA continues her travels around the world! This time, to the delight of our European fans, she’s heading to Germany for MMC Berlin! Guten Tag! Hello! Guess where's IA going this weekend?? Posted by IA　World Page on Tuesday, October 24, 2017 Guten Tag! Hello! Guess where’s …

The post IA at MMC Berlin in Germany! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After a successful screening at Japan EXPO in Paris, France, IA continues her travels around the world! This time, to the delight of our European fans, she’s heading to Germany for MMC Berlin!

Guten Tag! Hello! Guess where's IA going this weekend??

Posted by IA　World Page on Tuesday, October 24, 2017

Guten Tag! Hello! Guess where’s IA going this weekend??

MMC Berlin is a convention located in the capital of Germany. At the con, 1st Place will offer fans several concert screenings in addition to a workshop on how to use IA ROCKS, run with the help of our German team at VNN.

Fans will also find IA and ONE merchandise at their booth located next to the main stage. Those coming in an IA or ONE cosplay will also receive a cute IA choker for free. So be sure to check them out and don’t miss any event!

Hallo Germany!See you this week end in Berlin at MMC-Berlin e.V. (Mega Manga Convention)! Visit 1st PLACE booth with…

Posted by IA　World Page on Wednesday, October 25, 2017

Hallo Germany! See you this week end in Berlin at MMC-Berlin e.V. (Mega Manga Convention)!
Visit 1st PLACE booth with original IA goods!
Don’t miss the screening of the movie concert Party a GO GO…(Sunday 10.15 – 10.50 o´clock Main Hall |
Saturday 9.45 – 10.30in the Video Room )
And last but not least! Come to the Fukuoka Room on 28th from 13:30 to 15:00 and learn the how-to IA ROCKS and make a song together! #Yamaha VNN
The cosplay campaign is still on! Visitors showing to our booth in IA and ONE cosplay will receive our choker as present

Concert Screening

Saturday

Time: 9:30 AM ~ 10:30 AM CET
Room: Video room

Sunday

Time: 10:15 AM ~ 11 AM CET, 2:25 PM ~ 3:15 PM CET
Room: Fontane stage, Video room

Workshop

Date: Saturday, October 28th
Time: 1:30 PM ~ 3 PM CET
Room: Fukuoka (Room 4)

VocalNexus

Our partner, VocalNexus, is also offering fans a panel for those who are new to VOCALOID and want to broaden their minds and more!

Wir sind nächste Woche auf der MMC Berlin 2017 (Mega Manga Convention) zugegen.Am Stand bekommt ihr:Eine Wunschliste…

Posted by VocalNexus on Monday, October 23, 2017

We’ll be present at next week’s MMC Berlin 2017 (Mega Manga Convention).
At our booth you’ll get:
To request a song you’d like to be played on our next broadcast
To look at pictures of the last VOCAMERICA concert from Switzerland
A3 posters of Florian (Disco version from Vinny-Vieh) for 3 Euro
“We love Vocamerica” stickers for 2 Euro
and a little panel game
The winner will receive a VOCAMERICA Aki No Matsuri concert poster A3 sized (while stocks last)

In addition, you can visit our VOCALOID basics panel, “What is VOCALOID”, where we’ll teach you about the beginnings of VOCALOID and tell some funny and love-able stories from all over the world.

We look forward to seeing you!
-Lulu-

Saturday

Time: 4 PM ~ 5 PM CET
Room: Yokohama (Room 3)

Sunday

Time: 10:30 AM ~ 11:30 AM CET
Room: Yokohama (Room 3)

Find more information, check out MMC’s Facebook page or website (only German).

Links

IA World Page
MMC Berlin website
MMC Berlin Facebook

The post IA at MMC Berlin in Germany! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA at Japan Expo in Paris!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
We just recently announced that IA would be in Chile, but if you are not in the area, don’t worry! That’s not the only place she will be at. On the other side of the world in Paris, France, you can also find her there! Japan Expo will be taking place on July 6th-9th. The …

The post IA at Japan Expo in Paris! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We just recently announced that IA would be in Chile, but if you are not in the area, don’t worry! That’s not the only place she will be at. On the other side of the world in Paris, France, you can also find her there! Japan Expo will be taking place on July 6th-9th.

The concert screening for IA will take place on Friday, July 7th in the YUZUI room at 12:15 PM. New content is also said to be revealed of IA and ONE for the event.

In addition, you can find them at their booth (L 192 Hall 5) with goodies as well as the opportunity to take interactive photos with IA.

Links

Japan Expo’s Website

Japan Expo’s Facebook

IA World Page

1st Place’s Website

The post IA at Japan Expo in Paris! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA in Chile!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
If you follow VNN or IA World Page, you will know that over the past year, IA has been at many locations around the globe. Whether it be a concert or a concert screening, it’s safe to say that 1st Place is not hesitating to reach out to as many of its fans around the …

The post IA in Chile! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you follow VNN or IA World Page, you will know that over the past year, IA has been at many locations around the globe. Whether it be a concert or a concert screening, it’s safe to say that 1st Place is not hesitating to reach out to as many of its fans around the globe as possible. With that being said, the newest location where you will be able to find IA will be in Santiago, Chile, for the Super Japan Expo happening on October 7th and 8th.

As VNN tries to cover as many VOCALOID events as we can, you can be sure to also find us at this event as well as doing some coverage!

Stay tuned to VNN for more information on this event and IA!

Links

Super Japan Expo’s Website

Super Japan Expo’s Facebook

1st Place’s Website

IA World Page

The post IA in Chile! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Two IA Concert Screenings Announced This Weekend!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
1st Place is once again in full force and making their way around the world with IA. Whether it’s a concert screening or a live concert, they make sure to reach as many fans as possible! This weekend, two more concert screenings have been announced. The first is in Holland, Netherlands, on June 9th and the …

The post Two IA Concert Screenings Announced This Weekend! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
1st Place is once again in full force and making their way around the world with IA. Whether it’s a concert screening or a live concert, they make sure to reach as many fans as possible!

This weekend, two more concert screenings have been announced. The first is in Holland, Netherlands, on June 9th and the other in Brisbane, Australia, on June 11th.

Holland, Netherlands

The screening in Holland will have English subtitles. Therefore, if you do not understand Japanese, 1st Place has you covered.

Location: AnimeCon
Screening Room: MISSISSIPPI
Date: June 9th
Time: 9:30 PM

There will also be a 1st Place booth where you can buy IA merchandise. Lastly, if you show up in an IA or ONE cosplay, you can earn a free choker by getting your picture taken!

You can follow Animecon on Facebook or check out their official website for more information.

Brisbane, Australia

Location: AnimeLab Arena
Date: June 11th
Time: 11:00 AM – 12:00 PM

You can find more information on their official website.

If you are in the area, make sure to head on over!

Links

IA World Page

1st Place’s Official Website

The post Two IA Concert Screenings Announced This Weekend! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Two New “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Locations Announced!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
It’s been a little while since we’ve last heard much from 1st Place, but no need to worry! With convention season going in full swing, IA PARTY A GO-GO is back again! Their latest event was held in Australia and Mexico about a month ago, but now they are heading to Canada as well as …

The post Two New “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Locations Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been a little while since we’ve last heard much from 1st Place, but no need to worry! With convention season going in full swing, IA PARTY A GO-GO is back again! Their latest event was held in Australia and Mexico about a month ago, but now they are heading to Canada as well as Estonia!

Estonia

 

Hello Estonia!Don’t miss IA’s Party a GO GO screening at JAFF, the Japanese animation and lifestyle film festival…

Posted by IA　World Page on Sunday, April 16, 2017

Anime North

The next location will be in Toronto, Ontario, in Canada. Although we do not have much information on this event yet, we do know that Anime North will be taking place during the weekend of May 26th-28th. I (Monds) will also be in attendance at Anime North and I hope to see you there!

Stay tuned to VNN for updates on these events!

Links

Anime North

JAFF

1st Place Official Website

The post Two New “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Locations Announced! appeared first on VNN.
